data.title: 'The Decameron': Netflix brings new historical drama bigger than 'Bridgerton'. Here are details
data.meta_description: 'The Decameron' on Netflix is a historical drama that takes place in Florence in 1348 amid the bubonic plague. Saoirse-Monica Jackson, Tanya Reynolds, and Zosia Mamet are among the elites who flee to a remote estate in this story.
data.text:
Synopsis

'The Decameron' on Netflix is a historical drama that takes place in Florence in 1348 amid the bubonic plague. Saoirse-Monica Jackson, Tanya Reynolds, and Zosia Mamet are among the elites who flee to a remote estate in this story.

Netflix has a new rival that might be even more compelling than its well-liked series Bridgerton. The streaming giant's newest product, 'The Decameron', will launch on July 25. According to Yahoo Entertainment, this new series aims to recreate the same charm that initially made Bridgerton a smash, but with its own twist and historical context.

#Budget' 2024 with ET

Union Budget 2024 Live Updates

'The Decameron': Setting and plot

'The Decameron' takes viewers back to 1348, a time very different from Bridgerton Regency period. A group of aristocrats fleeing the Black Death to a country estate are the focus of the drama, which is set against the backdrop of Florence, Italy during the bubonic plague. The romantic atmosphere created by the enclosed setting suggests that the series will focus on the complexity of relationships that are strained by their circumstances.

Modern take on historical drama

'The Decameron' is a work of historical fiction, yet it makes some artistic license in its portrayal. The teaser makes it clear that a more modern delivery is chosen over traditional accents. This contemporary twist is consistent with Netflix's strategy of adapting historical dramas to a current audience while maintaining creative license, as demonstrated in Bridgerton.

'The Decameron': Characters and cast

The series has a stellar ensemble that includes well-known characters from hit television programs. Among the well-known figures gracing 'The Decameron' are Saoirse-Monica Jackson from Derry Girls, Tanya Reynolds from Sex Education, and Zosia Mamet from Girls. These performers promise captivating performances that might captivate a wide audience. They bring a lot of talent and fan bases from their prior great shows.

'The Decameron' is what Netflix is counting on to keep its place in the fiercely competitive streaming industry. Netflix needs a great new series to stay ahead of the competition as streaming services like Apple TV+ keep raising the stakes by starring A-list actors like Brad Pitt, George Clooney, and Matt Damon. Finding a niche in the costume romance category might be a calculated approach to draw in and keep readers.

FAQs:

What is Netflix's new show 'The Decameron' about?

'The Decameron' is a historical drama set in 1348 Florence during the bubonic plague, focusing on a group of aristocrats who retreat to a country estate to escape the Black Death.

Who are the main actors in 'The Decameron'?

The main cast includes Saoirse-Monica Jackson from Derry Girls, Tanya Reynolds from Sex Education, and Zosia Mamet from Girls.
